code: import{useEffect,useRef}from'react';var useInterval=function useInterval(callback,delay){var savedCallback=useRef();useEffect(function(){savedCallback.current=callback;});useEffect(function(){var tick=function tick(){savedCallback.current();};if(delay!==null){var timerId=setInterval(tick,delay);return function(){return clearInterval(timerId);};}},[delay]);};export default useInterval;
